name: fanart.tv
description: The place to go for specialised media centre fanart

apis.name: fanart.tv TV
apis.description: Our TV Fanart section has TV artwork to enhance your media centre experience, we maintain high standards to ensure you can rely on the quality that we provide, the TV section is the original fanart.tv offering and you will find a collection of tv show logos on transparent backgrounds (ClearLOGOs), images with the show logo and a character on a transparent background (ClearART) and a selection of landscape show and season thumbs (TV Thumbs and Season Thumbs). Every image goes through a moderation process to ensure quality.
